verses.verse: For it is superfluous <S%G4053><s%> for me to write <S%G1125><s%> to you about <S%G4012><s%> this <S%G3588><s%> ministry <S%G1248><s%> to the saints; <S%G40><s%>

for I know <S%G3609><s%> your readiness, <S%G4288><s%> of which <S%G3739><s%> I boast <S%G2744><s%> about <S%G5228><s%> you to the Macedonians, <S%G3110><s%> [namely,] that Achaia <S%G882><s%> has been prepared <S%G3903><s%> since <S%G575><s%> last <S%G4070><s%> year, <S%G4070><s%> and your zeal <S%G2205><s%> has stirred <S%G2042><s%> up most <S%G4183><s%> of them.

But I have sent <S%G3992><s%> the brethren, <S%G80><s%> that our boasting <S%G2745><s%> about <S%G5228><s%> you may not be made <S%G2758><s%> empty <S%G2758><s%> in this <S%G3778><s%> case, <S%G3313><s%> that, as I was saying, <S%G3004><s%> you may be prepared; <S%G3903><s%>

lest <S%G3381><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> any Macedonians <S%G3110><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> with me and find <S%G2147><s%> you unprepared, <S%G532><s%> we (not to speak <S%G3004><s%> of you) should be put <S%G2617><s%> to shame <S%G2617><s%> by this <S%G3778><s%> confidence. <S%G5287><s%>

So <S%G3767><s%> I thought <S%G2233><s%> it necessary <S%G316><s%> to urge <S%G3870><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%> that they would go <S%G4281><s%> on ahead <S%G4281><s%> to you and arrange <S%G4294><s%> beforehand <S%G4294><s%> your previously <S%G4279><s%> promised <S%G4279><s%> bountiful <S%G2129><s%> gift, <S%G2129><s%> that the same <S%G3778><s%> might be ready <S%G2092><s%> as a bountiful <S%G2129><s%> gift, <S%G2129><s%> and not affected <S%G5613><s%> by covetousness. <S%G4124><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> [I say,] he who sows <S%G4687><s%> sparingly <S%G5340><s%> shall also <S%G2532><s%> reap <S%G2325><s%> sparingly; <S%G5340><s%> and he who sows <S%G4687><s%> bountifully <S%G2129><s%> shall also <S%G2532><s%> reap <S%G2325><s%> bountifully. <S%G2129><s%>

Let each <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1538><s%> [do] just <S%G2531><s%> as he has purposed <S%G4255><s%> in his heart; <S%G2588><s%> not grudgingly <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3077><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> under <S%G1537><s%> compulsion; <S%G318><s%> for God <S%G2316><s%> loves <S%G25><s%> a cheerful <S%G2431><s%> giver. <S%G1395><s%>

And God <S%G2316><s%> is able <S%G1414><s%> to make <S%G4052><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> abound <S%G4052><s%> to you, that always <S%G3842><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> sufficiency <S%G841><s%> in everything, <S%G3956><s%> you may have <S%G2192><s%> an abundance <S%G4052><s%> for every <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> deed; <S%G2041><s%>
as it is written, <S%G1125><s%> "He scattered <S%G4650><s%> abroad, he gave <S%G1325><s%> to the poor, <S%G3993><s%> His righteousness <S%G1343><s%> abides <S%G3306><s%> forever. <S%G165><s%>"

Now <S%G1161><s%> He who supplies <S%G2023><s%> seed <S%G4690><s%> to the sower <S%G4687><s%> and bread <S%G740><s%> for food, <S%G1035><s%> will supply <S%G5524><s%> and multiply <S%G4129><s%> your seed <S%G4703><s%> for sowing and increase <S%G837><s%> the harvest <S%G7032><s%> of your righteousness; <S%G1343><s%>

you will be enriched <S%G4148><s%> in everything <S%G3956><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> liberality, <S%G572><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> us is producing <S%G2716><s%> thanksgiving <S%G2169><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%>

For the ministry <S%G1248><s%> of this <S%G3778><s%> service <S%G3009><s%> is not only <S%G3440><s%> fully <S%G4322><s%> supplying <S%G4322><s%> the needs <S%G5303><s%> of the saints, <S%G40><s%> but is also <S%G2532><s%> overflowing <S%G4052><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> thanksgivings <S%G2169><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%>

Because <S%G1223><s%> of the proof <S%G1382><s%> given by this <S%G3778><s%> ministry <S%G1248><s%> they will glorify <S%G1392><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> for [your] obedience <S%G5292><s%> to your confession <S%G3671><s%> of the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and for the liberality <S%G572><s%> of your contribution <S%G2842><s%> to them and to all, <S%G3956><s%>

while they also, <S%G2532><s%> by prayer <S%G1162><s%> on your behalf, <S%G5228><s%> yearn <S%G1971><s%> for you because <S%G1223><s%> of the surpassing <S%G5235><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in you.
Thanks <S%G5485><s%> be to God <S%G2316><s%> for His indescribable <S%G411><s%> gift! <S%G1431><s%>
